title: (x) "Kick start your" ornate serif face - Columbus {Yves}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230144im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sharvey90_sample1_5648.gif)

 [‹ Wild boar CK35 logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230144/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35559 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Karate" black italic face w/ tiny serifs on apron ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230144/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35568 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sharvey90

comments.content: Good thing I quickly checked the Board before turning in — this is a horribly [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080208230144/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squooshed) Columbus.
squished but discernible. I wouldn’t have even known. You’re the best! Thanks so much.

\> _You’re the best!_

Nah, there’s a couple of hotshots here that are better than me. But I’m still the one that _runs_ this board. Bwa-hahahahaha! ;^)
